name: Mage Maker
description:
Controls:

•   Arrow Keys or A, D and W = Move and Jump

•   Mouse = Click

•   Double Click = Delete

Mobile Controls:

•   Right and Left Buttons = Move

•   Up Button = Jump

•   Double Click = Delete

Tips:

•   Find out what each item does and each secret it hides!!

•   You finish the level when you reach the End Flag.

•   The Gem is an extra collectible.

Tools Used:

•   Construct 2 (game engine)

•   Piskel (pixel art)
